content:
Sure, here are a few possible sets of lyrics that match the prosody of "Boom, boom, bang, boom, tick, boom, bang, tick", and that could be used in an electronic dance music song:

Verse 1:
"Feel the rhythm in your bones
Boom, boom, bang, boom, tick, boom, bang, tick
It's a symphony of beats and tones
Boom, boom, bang, boom, tick, boom, bang, tick"

Chorus:
"Let the music take control
Boom, boom, bang, boom, tick, boom, bang, tick
Feel the energy, let it roll
Boom, boom, bang, boom, tick, boom, bang, tick"

Verse 2:
"The bass is thumping in your chest
Boom, boom, bang, boom, tick, boom, bang, tick
Feel the energy, it's at its best
Boom, boom, bang, boom, tick, boom, bang, tick"

Chorus:
"Let the music take control
Boom, boom, bang, boom, tick, boom, bang, tick
Feel the energy, let it roll
Boom, boom, bang, boom, tick, boom, bang, tick"

Bridge:
"This is the rhythm of the night
Boom, boom, bang, boom, tick, boom, bang, tick
Feel the beat, it feels just right
Boom, boom, bang, boom, tick, boom, bang, tick"

Please keep in mind that this is just a suggestion and you can always use your own
